00074                 {
00075                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UFlexer, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(data_))
00076

00078                 }

00090         virtual int yylex(void* yyval);

00097         virtual int LexerInput(char* buf, int max_size)
00098                 {
00099                 U_TRACE(0, "UFlexer::LexerInput(%p,%d)", buf, max_size)
00100 
00101                 int length = min(max((int)data.size() - write_position, 0), max_size);
00102 
00103                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("length = %d data.size() = %u", length, data.size())
00104 
00105                 if (length)
00106                         {
00107                         length = data.copy(buf, length, write_position);
00108 
00109                         write_position += length;
00110 
00111                         U_RETURN(length);
00112                         }
00113 
00114                 U_RETURN(0);
00115                 }
00116 
00117         void reset()
00118                 {
00119                 U_TRACE(0, "UFlexer::reset()")
00120 
00121         // yyFlexLexer::yy_flush_buffer(yyFlexLexer::yy_current_buffer);
00122 
00123                 parsed_chars = write_position = 0;
00124                 }
00125 
00126         // VARIE
00127 
00128         uint32_t size() const { return data.size(); }

00134                 U_TRACE(0, "UFlexer::setData(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(data_))

00139         UString substr(int offset, int length) { return data.substr(offset, length); }
